attributes.action: Make the advertising of fake jobs illegal
attributes.additional_details: To make the advertising of fake jobs illegal and to take action against the vast number of rogue recruiting agencies who exploit innocent applicants by stealing their personal information through deception with no intent of finding them a job or being contactable by the applying victim. Agencies should be regulalry investigated to reduce the huge number of fake jobs that are advertised freely accross the country with blatent gay abandon.
